statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); model_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.id'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); case "$model_id" in *opus-4*) ip=15; op=75;; *sonnet-4*) ip=3; op=15;; *haiku*) ip=0.8; op=4;; *opus*) ip=15; op=75;; *) ip=3; op=15;; esac; cost=$(echo "$total_in $total_out $ip $op" | awk '{printf "$%.2f", ($1*$3+$2*$4)/1000000}'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); tokens=$(printf %.0f "$current" | sed -e :a -e 's/\(.*[0-9]\)\([0-9]\{3\}\)/\1,\2/;ta'); if [ $pct -ge 60 ]; then printf '\033[38;5;246m%s · Context: \033[97m%s\033[38;5;246m spent, \033[33m%d%% used (compact soon!)\033[38;5;246m, \033[97m%s\033[38;5;246m tokens\033[0m' "$model" "$cost" "$pct" "$tokens"; else printf '\033[38;5;246m%s · Context: \033[97m%s\033[38;5;246m spent, \033[97m%d%%\033[38;5;246m used, \033[97m%s\033[38;5;246m tokens\033[0m' "$model" "$cost" "$pct" "$tokens"; fi; else printf '\033[38;5;246m%s · Context: \033[97m%s\033[38;5;246m spent, no tokens used yet\033[0m' "$model" "$cost"; fi
